AI generated news summaries. Removes biases and opinions from news articles. Browse news without views.


Transform the way you consume news with our AI News Summarizer Chrome Plugin. Designed for the modern, fast-paced world, this innovative tool uses cutting-edge AI technology to provide quick, unbiased summaries of news articles. Say goodbye to sifting through opinionated content and embrace a streamlined approach to staying informed.

Key Features:

    AI-Driven Summaries: Get to the heart of the story fast with AI-generated, factual briefs.
    Bias-Free News: Enjoy news as it should be - free from personal opinions and slants.
    Effortless Browsing: Navigate through news efficiently, saving time while remaining well-informed.
    User-Friendly: Easy to install and use, this plugin is a must-have for anyone seeking a neutral, fact-focused news experience.

Whether you're a professional on the go, a student, or just someone keen on staying updated without the clutter of biases, our AI News Summarizer is your perfect news companion. Install now and start experiencing news in a smarter, more efficient way!
